Name.description: Name of the creator of the monitor

Handle.description: Handle of the creator of the monitor

Email.description: Email of the creator of the monitor

Critical.description: Threshold value for triggering an alert

CriticalRecovery.description: Threshold value for recovering from an alert state

OK.description: Threshold value for recovering from an alert state

Warning.description: Threshold value for triggering a warning

WarningRecovery.description: Threshold value for recovering from a warning state

TriggerWindow.description: How long a metric must be anomalous before triggering an alert

RecoveryWindow.description: How long an anomalous metric must be normal before recovering from an alert state

EnableLogsSample.description: Whether or not to include a sample of the logs

EscalationMessage.description: Message to include with a re-notification when renotify_interval is set

EvaluationDelay.description: Time in seconds to delay evaluation

IncludeTags.description: Whether or not to include triggering tags into notification title

Locked.description: Whether or not changes to this monitor should be restricted to the creator or admins

MinLocationFailed.description: Number of locations allowed to fail before triggering alert

NewHostDelay.description: Time in seconds to allow a host to start reporting data before starting the evaluation of monitor results

NoDataTimeframe.description: Number of minutes data stopped reporting before notifying

NotifyAudit.description: Whether or not to notify tagged users when changes are made to the monitor

NotifyNoData.description: Whether or not to notify when data stops reporting

RenotifyInterval.description: Number of minutes after the last notification before the monitor re-notifies on the current status

RequireFullWindow.description: Whether or not the monitor requires a full window of data before it is evaluated

SyntheticsCheckID.description: ID of the corresponding synthetics check

TimeoutH.description: Number of hours of the monitor not reporting data before it automatically resolves

RenotifyOccurrences.description: The number of times re-notification messages should be sent on the current status at the provided re-notification interval.

RenotifyStatuses.description: The types of monitor statuses for which re-notification messages are sent.

MinFailureDuration.description: How long the test should be in failure before alerting (integer, number of seconds, max 7200).

NewGroupDelay.description: Time (in seconds) to skip evaluations for new groups. For example, this option can be used to skip evaluations for new hosts while they initialize. Must be a non negative integer

ApiURL.description: Datadog API URL (defaults to https://api.datadoghq.com) Use https://api.datadoghq.eu for EU accounts.
